resources.string: Reveal webviews using ripples and animate transitions
Pressing most links will launch in a new overlay so you can easily swipe back to the original page. Note that this does result in slightly longer loads given that the whole page is reloaded.
Overlay Full Screen Swipe to Dismiss
Swipe right from anywhere on the overlaying web to close the browser. If disabled, only swiping from the left edge will move it.

Allow swiping between the pages in the main view to switch tabs. By default, the swiping automatically stops when you long press on an item, such as the like button. Disabling this will prevent page swiping altogether.
Show confirmation dialog before exiting the app
Enable anonymous analytics to help improve the app. No personal information is ever exposed.
